forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will mix with rain at times this afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow overnight. Some accumulation possible. Low 1C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 34F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will taper off as a few snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning...changing to all rain. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. WNW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. WNW winds shifting to NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
